title: Move in over here.... Woot Woot
posting_body: 4 WEEKS FREE ON 14 AND 15 MONTH LEASE TERMS
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 698 Sq.
With modern apartments, spacious floor plans, and resort-style amenities, Artist Walk is the definition of urban luxury.
Proud to be a part of the booming community of Fremont, we are close to a variety of shopping, dining, and entertainment options.
Plus, we give new meaning to the word “convenience” by offering our residents access to on-site retailers & restaurants.
We have everything you need, all in one place.
Come visit us today to see why you should be making Artist Walk your new home.

Gourmet Kitchens with Pantry, Wired for Technology, Personal Balconies or Patios, Abundant Closet Space, Quartz Countertops Throughout, Modern Custom-Wood Cabinetry, Open-Concept Living Areas, One- and Two-Bedroom Residences, Expansive 12-Foot Ceilings*, Complete Stainless Steel Appliance Packages, We Love Pets!
*, Distinctive Wood-Style Flooring, Expansive 9-Foot Ceilings, Washer & Dryer in Every Home

Resort-Inspired Pool & Spa with Seating, Covered Parking Available, Elevator Access, Online Rent Payment & Service Requests, Retail On Site, Community Barbecues, Clubhouse with Wi-Fi Access in Common Areas, Controlled-Access Community, Bike Shop & Storage, Fitness Center with Top-of-the-Line Equipment, Yoga and Spin Rooms, Artist Place with Event Space, Professional On-Site Management, Clubroom with Seating and TVs
